webhookRegistration.title: Webhook Registration
webhookRegistration.description: Manage webhook endpoints per tenant„ÄÅrotate HMAC secrets, and decide which events each endpoint receives.

actions.rotateHint: Rotating the HMAC secret will regenerate a brand-new signing token. Use this when the endpoint credentials may be leaked.

form.name: Display name
form.secretHint: System will only show the secret once after create/rotate, please copy and store it securely.

messages.secretRotated: Secret rotated. Copy the new token:

messages.saveError: Save failed. Please check required fields.
messages.noEventSelected: Please select at least one event.
